titles.title: Taxpayer-Funded Facility Restoration Stewardship Act
Taxpayer-Funded Facility Restoration Stewardship Act

A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the head of a department or organization within the Department of Defense to place an order with any other such department or organization for certain construction projects on a reimbursable basis.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Taxpayer-Funded Facility Restoration Stewardship Act
This bill authorizes departments or organizations within the Department of Defense (DOD) to place an order with any other such department or organization, on a reimbursable basis, for a project for the maintenance and repair of a DOD facility or for a minor military construction project.
